name: SoulForm
description:
Make a song with your body! This game is an experiment intended to reproduce the feeling I get when I dance to music.

For the best experience, plug in a dance mat and hook up the arrows to WASD. Try playing with more than one person for a real good time!

Controls:

  • WASD/dance mat arrows for various types of bass
  • Leap Motion to play notes

Want to learn how to play?
See an example of me playing the game here: http://youtu.be/CeE2m7XQZmU
